meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat and stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her nattinesses always stood out at the party.
meanings.sent2: She takes pride in her nattinesses whenever she goes out.
meanings.sent3: Even her cat seemed impressed by her nattinesses.
meanings.sent4: Her nattinesses shone like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nattinesses of her outfit was the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The act of being well-groomed and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: His nattinesses caught everyone's attention at the event.
meanings.sent2: People admired her nattinesses wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: His nattinesses made him the envy of his friends.
meanings.sent4: The nattinesses of her appearance was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: She exuded nattinesses in every outfit she wore.
